column.name: status
column.Comment: A - for active , I - for inactive

column.name: is_loyalty
column.Comment: 0 for not loyaly and 1 for loyalty

column.name: place_id
column.Comment: this will contain all store id and 3D Model Place's Lat/lang

column.name: scan_coupon_status
column.Comment: 1 for active, 2 for redeem or success, 3 for expired, 4 for reserved

column.name: device_type
column.Comment: A for Android, W for Windows, I for Iphone
